definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: I wonder why my classmates now like led pencils so much?
sentences.chinese: 我很想知道爲什麼現在的同學們這麼喜歡自動鉛筆呢？

sentences.english: Do you think they should upgrade the mechanical pencil?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得自動鉛筆應該再更新嗎？

sentences.english: The teacher award him a automatic pencil and a box of ink.
sentences.chinese: 老師獎了他一支自動鉛筆和一盒筆芯。

sentences.english: Is this a mechanical pencil or a ballpoint pen?
sentences.chinese: 這枝是自動鉛筆還是原子筆？

definition: felt-tip pen/roller ball pen/gel ink pen
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
to return something to its rightful owner
a device used to check money and detect counterfeit bills
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
